document.heading: Credit Union Life Insurance Ceiling Amendment Act of 1981

history.narrative: Law 4-55, the “Credit Union Life Insurance Ceiling Amendment Act of 1981,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-291, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 15, 1981, and September 29, 1981, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 19, 1981, it was assigned Act No. 4-96 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
